title: RANKED MASTERY BUG
body: I didn't know where else to post this but to re-create the bug you need to view another summoners profile while in queue for ranked game then accept the game while in champion select your masterys will change to the summoners you have viewed. Note this only happened to masterys not runes so it will have no negative effect just worth a fix i think

replies.body:
There is a bug report forum here:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report

Posting there and/or submitting a support ticket is the best way to get this noticed :)
